name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pre-construction
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that you are working with the latest IFC drawings.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to Construction
Acceptance Criteria - Please ensure that the permit to work is the latest and approved, and that Existing Services have been positively identified.
3.3 - The survey set out of ducting alignment.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to Construction
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent with the IFC construction drawings.
Note: All positions to be confirmed on site prior to construction
○ If trenching needs to intersect or traverse existing services, appropriate temporary protection must be implemented.
Verifying Document - Survey set out records
3.4 - Marking out of existing services. Confirm there are no clashes with design and existing services
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to Construction
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent with the IFC construction drawings.
3.5 - Material Compliance - 50mm or 100mm or 150mm uPVC Ducts
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to Construction
Acceptance Criteria - Ducts shall comply with AS/NZS 61386:2015 or AS/NZS 2053.2:2001. Orange for Power & Salmon for Fibre, green for telecom. Also required print marking details of the configuration
Verifying Document - Product Technical Datasheet, Delivery Dockets
Frequency - Prior to work starting on site and upond delivery to site.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to construction.
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent with the ICF drawings
Frequency - Prior to work starting on site
3.7 - Incoming Material Inspection for all products and good delivered onto the project site
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Delivery
Acceptance Criteria - Material inspected apon arrival for defects, material handling and storage is suitable and follows manufactures guidelines.
4.1.1 - Ensure all sevice in conflict with placement of ducting area exposed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Potholing
Acceptance Criteria - All existing services have been identified and confirmed. If trenching needs to intersect or traverse existing services, appropriate temporary protection must be implemented.
Verifying Document - Visual inspection and documented.
Frequency - Prior to the works starting
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction

Acceptance Criteria - Alignment and elevation consistent with the IFC drawings. Where excavation depth exceeds 1.5m the trench shields will be used if the excavations exceed 1.5 meters in depth to Work Safe NZ requirements, All works will be undertaken using hydraulic excavators operated by a competent operator, and all waste material will be removed from the site, and taken to a clean fill site
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction
Acceptance Criteria - 100mm thick or as shown in the IFC drawings
5.1.2 - Laying Ducts for Power and Fibre
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction
Acceptance Criteria - As shown in the IFC drawings.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction
Acceptance Criteria - Check with the as-built data if any services coming close then work to the standard clearance to each services as detailed in project spec
Inspection Type - Visual Inspection and verification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction
Acceptance Criteria - Dimensions as shown in the IFC drawings
Verifying Document - Ducting Installation Checksheet, Photos
5.1.5 - As Built Survey of the laid ducts
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent with Issued For Construction drawings
Verifying Document - As Built Survey Records
Frequency - After ducts and chambers are installed
5.1.6 - Backfill ducts with Sand Material or approved material.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - During construction
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent with Issued For Construction drawings
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Upon completion of works
Acceptance Criteria - Construction within a tolerance of drawings & specifications
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Upon completion of works
Acceptance Criteria - Comply with the project specification and drawings
Verifying Document - As built survey record completed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Upon completion of works
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent with the IFC drawings.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Upon completion of works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Upon completion of works
Acceptance Criteria - All signed and closed out
